instruction:
Given an English sentence, generate an Chinese-annotated English sentence. Annotation is the use of words from another language to explain certain words in a sentence. 
[English Sentence]: Level of financial literacy of senior citizens and young people is relatively low, and they will still be the key objects of financial education; according to the Report on Debt Status of Chinese Young People issued by Nelson and the Report of Consumption of Chinese Young People from 2019 to 2020 issued by CTV Finance, the younger generation has huge consumption potential, and credit consumption has become an important means of consumption upgrading; 86.6% of young people are using credit products, and nearly half of them have no debt buildup; although there is a relatively rational consumption trend among the younger generation, which is drastically different from the label of “excessive squander” put on them by society, some young people indeed are involved in excessive consumption and consumption by following the trend, leading to excessive financial pressure and debt risks, and even resulting in increasing social problems; financial enterprises shall shoulder their social responsibilities and guide young consumers in a positive way.
output: The level of financial literacy (金融素养) of senior citizens (老年人) and young people (青少年) is relatively low, and they will still be the key objects (重点对象) of financial education (金融教育); according to the Report on Debt Status (负债状况报告) of Chinese Young People issued by Nelson and the Report of Consumption (消费报告) of Chinese Young People from 2019 to 2020 issued by CTV Finance, the younger generation (年轻一代) has huge consumption potential (消费潜力), and credit consumption (信用消费) has become an important means (重要途径) of consumption upgrading (消费升级); 86.6% of young people are using credit products (信贷产品), and nearly half of them have no debt buildup (债务累积); although there is a relatively rational consumption trend (理性消费趋势) among the younger generation, which is drastically different from the label (标签) of “excessive squander” (过度挥霍) put on them by society, some young people indeed are involved in excessive consumption (过度消费) and consumption by following the trend (跟风消费), leading to excessive financial pressure (财务压力) and debt risks (债务风险), and even resulting in increasing social problems (社会问题); financial enterprises (金融企业) shall shoulder their social responsibilities (社会责任) and guide young consumers (年轻消费者) in a positive way (正向引导).

instruction:

[English Sentence]: In addition to insisting on objective confidence, path confidence and ability confidence, universities and colleges shall also give full play to three advantages: the first one is the advantage of backwardness; through the continuous introduction of overseas outstanding academic talents and learning from the advanced experience of world-class universities, significantly improve the academic level and school running quality; the second one is the cultural advantage; inheriting the wisdom of the Chinese civilization accumulated for five thousand years and carrying forward excellent traditional culture, unify strength, build brand and improve image; the third one is system advantage; give play to the institutional advantages of socialist countries, strengthen objective driving, collect consensus and joining forces, optimize resource configuration, and provide sustainable and solid support for the university to speed up catching up with and surpassing the world advanced level.
output: In addition to insisting on objective confidence (目标自信), path confidence (路径自信), and ability confidence (能力自信), universities and colleges shall also give full play to three advantages: the first one is the advantage of backwardness (后发优势); through the continuous introduction of overseas outstanding academic talents (海外杰出学术人才) and learning from the advanced experience (先进经验) of world-class universities (世界一流大学), significantly improve the academic level (学术水平) and school running quality (办学质量); the second one is the cultural advantage (文化优势); inheriting the wisdom (智慧内涵) of the Chinese civilization (中华文明) accumulated for five thousand years (五千年) and carrying forward excellent traditional culture (优秀传统文化), unify strength (凝聚力量), build brand (塑造品牌), and improve image (提升形象); the third one is system advantage (制度优势); give play to the institutional advantages (制度优越性) of socialist countries (社会主义国家), strengthen objective driving (目标驱动), collect consensus (汇集共识) and joining forces (合力), optimize resource configuration (资源配置), and provide sustainable and solid support (可持续的坚实保障) for the university to speed up catching up with and surpassing (赶超和超越) the world advanced level (世界先进水平).

instruction:

output: Message from Xinhua News Agency (新华社) Nanning on May 19 (journalist: Zhang Ying) according to information from the Department of Education (教育厅) of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region (广西壮族自治区), universities and colleges (高校) in Guangxi will implement a flexible education system (弹性学制) and broaden the time limit for schooling suspension (休学) for students, and the year limit for students at school who suspend schooling to start their own businesses (创业) can be extended by 2 to up to 5 years based on the original length of the education system, and the time for suspension from school and entrepreneurship can be regarded as the time for practical education (实践教育).

instruction:
Given an English sentence, generate an Chinese-annotated English sentence. Annotation is the use of words from another language to explain certain words in a sentence. 
[English Sentence]: In order to prepare a set of test questions in accordance with practical conditions of teaching and learning, it is necessary to set questions with normal distribution in difficulty degree according to general learning conditions of students; it is also required to learn about the teaching situation, comprehensively analyze how well the students have learned so as to have a good command of the level of difficulty and type of question in designing the test paper, giving priority to inspection of basic knowledge, and testing their ability at the same time; creative designs on the type of question can be made as well.
output: In order to prepare a set of test questions (试题) in accordance with practical conditions (实际) of teaching (教) and learning (学), it is necessary to set questions (题目) with normal distribution (正态分布) in difficulty degree (难易) according to general learning conditions (学习整体情况) of students (学生); it is also required to learn about the teaching situation (教学情况), comprehensively analyze (全面分析) how well the students have learned (学习的程度) so as to have a good command of the level of difficulty (难易) and type of question (题型) in designing the test paper (考试命题), giving priority to inspection (考察) of basic knowledge (基础知识), and testing their ability (能力) at the same time; creative designs (创新设计) on the type of question can be made as well.

instruction:
Given an English sentence, generate an Chinese-annotated English sentence. Annotation is the use of words from another language to explain certain words in a sentence. 
[English Sentence]: Solving problems such as types of questions are few and repetitive questions by way of changing the system is a task that college exam administration needs to deal with; regulations need to be issued, but efforts should be made in normal times; it requires teachers to comprehensive master the teaching and learning situation; they need to not only master their teaching content but also the learning situation of the students; mastering both can better connect teaching and learning, forming an effective interaction; exams will be more fit for the actual situation, and straight A students and slack students can both get what they deserve.
output: Solving problems such as types of questions (题型) that are few (少) and repetitive (重复) by way of changing the system (机制) is a task that college exam administration (考务) needs to deal with; regulations (制度) need to be issued, but efforts (功夫) should be made in normal times (日常); it requires teachers (教师) to comprehensively (全面) master (掌握) the teaching (教学) and learning (学习) situation; they need to not only master (吃透) their teaching content (教学内容) but also the learning situation (学习情况) of the students (学生); mastering both can better connect (对接) teaching and learning, forming an effective (良性) interaction (互动); exams (考试) will be more fit (符合) for the actual situation (实际), and straight A students (学霸) and slack students (学渣) can both get what they deserve (各得其所).

instruction:
Given an English sentence, generate an Chinese-annotated English sentence. Annotation is the use of words from another language to explain certain words in a sentence. 
[English Sentence]: The economic development and epidemic prevention and control of our country is a leading position in the world, with the characteristics of strong development tenacity, great potential and sufficient motivation continuing to emerge; the strategic scientific and technological strength has expanded in an accelerated way, with significant innovative achievements emerging continuously; the scientific and technological innovation ability is continuously improved, leading to new breakthroughs in key and core technologies; the industry chain tenacity is improved, and the foreign trade quantity and quality have been elevated, structure is further optimized, and new kinetic energy represented by new industries, new business forms and new models grows and expands; the reform and opening up are promoted in a deeper way, so as to break through the blocking points restraining the matching of the supply and the demand and the flowing of factors, and to build new competitiveness for cooperation with high-standard opening up; the guarantee of people’s livelihood is powerful and effective, employment scale is further expanded, and personal income growth is basically in step with economic growth; the grain output of the whole year has been more than 1.3 trillion jin for 7 consecutive years, getting “good harvest for 18 consecutive years”; the construction of ecological civilization has been continuously promoted, and the peak carbon dioxide emissions and the carbon neutrality works have been planned as a whole, the green low-carbon transformation has been ongoing in a steady way, and ecological environment has made new achievements.
output: The economic development (经济发展) and epidemic prevention and control (疫情防控) of our country (我国) is a leading position (领先地位) in the world, with the characteristics (特点) of strong development tenacity (发展韧性), great potential (潜力大) and sufficient motivation (动力足) continuing to emerge; the strategic scientific and technological strength (国家战略科技力量) has expanded in an accelerated way, with significant innovative achievements (重大创新成果) emerging continuously; the scientific and technological innovation ability (科技创新能力) is continuously improved, leading to new breakthroughs (新突破) in key and core technologies (关键核心技术); the industry chain tenacity (产业链韧性) is improved, and the foreign trade quantity (对外贸易量) and quality (增质) have been elevated, structure (结构) is further optimized, and new kinetic energy (新动能) represented by new industries (新产业), new business forms (新业态) and new models (新模式) grows and expands; the reform and opening up (改革开放) are promoted in a deeper way, so as to break through the blocking points (堵点) restraining the matching of the supply (供需适配) and the demand (需求) and the flowing of factors (要素流动), and to build new competitiveness (新优势) for cooperation with high-standard opening up (高水平对外开放); the guarantee of people’s livelihood (民生保障) is powerful and effective, employment scale (就业规模) is further expanded, and personal income growth (居民收入增长) is basically in step with economic growth (经济增长); the grain output (粮食产量) of the whole year has been more than 1.3 trillion jin (1.3万亿斤) for 7 consecutive years (连续7年), getting “good harvest for 18 consecutive years” (十八连丰); the construction of ecological civilization (生态文明建设) has been continuously promoted, and the peak carbon dioxide emissions (碳达峰) and the carbon neutrality (碳中和) works have been planned as a whole, the green low-carbon transformation (绿色低碳转型) has been ongoing in a steady way, and ecological environment (生态环境) has made new achievements (新成效).

[English Sentence]: We should carry forward the great spirit of Party building, insist on the fundamental principle of seeking for improvement in stability, implement the development idea in a complete, accurate and comprehensive way, accelerate construction of the new development pattern, comprehensively deepen reform and opening up, insist on driving development with innovation, promote high-quality development, insist on taking the supply-side structural reform as the principal line, coordinate the epidemic prevention and control and economic and social development as a whole, plan development and security as a whole, continue to implement “six-stability” and “six-guarantee” work, continue to improve people’s livelihood, lay emphasis on stabilizing macroscopic economy, keep economy operation within reasonable ranges and maintain social stability; in this way, we must be able to keep a stable and healthy economic environment, a peaceful and safe social environment, a clean and upright political environment, and welcome the successful convocation of the 20th CPC National Congress with excellent results.

instruction:

output: Xinhua News Agency (新华社) Beijing (北京) December 11th (12月11日电) (Reporters (记者) Dong Ruifeng (董瑞丰), Gu Tiancheng (顾天成)) State Council (国务院) joint prevention and control mechanism (联防联控机制) recently issued (印发) a notice (通知) about strengthening (加强) epidemic prevention and control (疫情防控) of COVID-19 (新冠肺炎) in port cities (口岸城市), asking (要求) people (人员) who recently left (离开) land border port cities (陆地边境口岸城市) (except (除外) those connected (有口岸相连的) with ports (口岸) of Hong Kong (香港) and Macao (澳门)) to hold (需持有) the negative result (阴性证明) of nucleic acid test (核酸检测) within (内) 48 hours (48小时), and people (人员) who go to (前往) the land border port cities (陆地边境口岸城市) should take (进行) the nucleic acid test (核酸检测) at least (至少) once (1次) after (后) arrival (抵达).

instruction:
Given an English sentence, generate an Chinese-annotated English sentence. Annotation is the use of words from another language to explain certain words in a sentence. 
[English Sentence]: Article 19 A person who has obtained the qualification certificate of Level 1 and Level 2 registered Fire Engineer and applies for registration shall be employed by an approved fire protection technical service institution or key fire safety unit, and the employer shall submit registration application materials to the fire protection institution of the public security organ in the place where the employer is located (if the employer is an enterprise, it shall be submitted to the place where the industrial and commercial registration is located).
output: Article 19 A person who has obtained the qualification certificate of Level 1 (一级) and Level 2 (二级) registered Fire Engineer (注册消防工程师) and applies for registration (申请注册) shall be employed (受聘) by an approved (经批准的) fire protection technical service institution (消防技术服务机构) or key fire safety unit (消防安全重点单位), and the employer (聘用单位) shall submit (提交) registration application materials (注册申请材料) to the fire protection institution (消防机构) of the public security organ (公安机关) in the place where the employer is located (聘用单位所在地) (if the employer is an enterprise (企业), it shall be submitted to the place where the industrial and commercial registration (工商注册) is located).

instruction:
Given an English sentence, generate an Chinese-annotated English sentence. Annotation is the use of words from another language to explain certain words in a sentence. 
[English Sentence]: Article 20 After receiving the registration application materials of the applicant, the fire protection institutions of the public security organs of provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the central government shall inform the applicant of all the contents that need to be supplemented and corrected all at once on the spot or within 5 working days if the application materials are incomplete or do not conform to the legal form; if they fail to inform within the time limit, they will be accepted from the date of receiving the application materials.
output: Article 20 After receiving the registration application materials of the applicant (申请人), the fire protection institutions (消防机构) of the public security organs (公安机关) of provinces (省), autonomous regions (自治区) and municipalities directly under the central government (直辖市) shall inform the applicant of all the contents that need to be supplemented and corrected (补正) all at once on the spot or within 5 working days (工作日) if the application materials are incomplete (不齐全) or do not conform to the legal form (法定形式); if they fail to inform within the time limit, they will be accepted (受理) from the date of receiving the application materials.

instruction:

output: For the registration applications (注册申请) that are accepted (受理) or rejected (不予受理), a written certificate (书面凭证) stamped (加盖) with the special seal (专用印章) of the fire protection institution (消防机构) of the public security organ (公安机关) at the same level (本级) and date (注明日期) shall be issued.

instruction:
Given an English sentence, generate an Chinese-annotated English sentence. Annotation is the use of words from another language to explain certain words in a sentence. 
[English Sentence]: Article 21 The fire protection institutions of the public security organs of provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the central government shall, within 20 working days after the date of accepting the registration application, complete the preliminary review of the application materials for the registration of the Level 1 registered Fire Engineer qualification and the registration and approval of the Level 2 registered Fire Engineer qualification according to the specified conditions and procedures, and submit the application materials for the registration of the Level 1 registered Fire Engineer qualification and the preliminary review opinions to the Fire Department of the Ministry of Public Security for approval.
output: Article 21 The fire protection institutions of the public security organs (公共安全机关) of provinces (省), autonomous regions (自治区) and municipalities directly under the central government (直辖市) shall, within 20 working days (工作日) after the date of accepting the registration application (注册申请), complete the preliminary review (初步审查) of the application materials for the registration of the Level 1 registered Fire Engineer qualification (一级注册消防工程师资格) and the registration and approval (注册审批) of the Level 2 registered Fire Engineer qualification (二级注册消防工程师资格) according to the specified conditions (规定条件) and procedures (程序), and submit the application materials for the registration of the Level 1 registered Fire Engineer qualification and the preliminary review opinions (初步审查意见) to the Fire Department (消防局) of the Ministry of Public Security (公安部) for approval.

instruction:

[English Sentence]: According to the FWC, patchier bloom conditions are being reported in areas of Pinellas, Manatee, Sarasota, Charlotte and Collier counties - which suggests decreasing concentrations.
output: According to the FWC (佛罗里达鱼类和野生动物委员会), patchier bloom conditions (水华现象) are being reported in areas of Pinellas (皮尼拉斯), Manatee (马纳提), Sarasota (萨拉索塔), Charlotte (夏洛特) and Collier (科利尔) counties - which suggests decreasing concentrations (浓聚物的浓度).
